title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 175: Featuring Brendan Walsh
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by a Boston legend, Brendan Walsh. Walshy joins to talk about his pro career, his time at BU, his time at Maine and some of the craziest stories we've heard on the podcast. The guys also break down both conference finals series and give their thoughts on some recent NHL news. The boys also touch on Mother's Day and how they spent the day.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
